title: T206 HOFers FOR SALE updated availability

posts.post_title: T206 HOFers FOR SALE updated availability
posts.post_content:
I am selling the following cards to make some room in my collection.  These are all very nice for the grades, they have spectacular eye appeal, and would make a great addition to someones collection.  All prices are delivered, and first email that says "I'll take it," gets it.  Paypal gift or payment owed preferred.  pm or email to [url]rdamboise4@gmail.com[/url] if interested.

T206 Hughie Jennings Tigers One Hand In Air Piedmont 350-460 Subjects VG $69 SOLD :)
